name: 42-api
title: 42 Api Tools
description: Track your logtime and find peers in 42 school clusters directly from Raycast
author: maujogue

commands.name: find-user
commands.title: Find User
commands.subtitle: 42 API
commands.description: This displays the user exact location in the clusters.

preferences.name: userLogin
preferences.title: Your 42 Login
preferences.description: Your 42 username (for menu bar logtime display)

preferences.name: goalHours
preferences.title: Daily Goal (hours)
preferences.description: The target number of hours to reach before triggering confetti

preferences.name: goalMinutes
preferences.title: Daily Goal (minutes)
preferences.description: The target number of minutes to reach before triggering confetti

preferences.name: clientId
preferences.title: 42 OAuth Client ID
preferences.description: Your OAuth application Client ID (UID). Get it from https://profile.intra.42.fr/oauth/applications

preferences.name: clientSecret
preferences.title: 42 OAuth Client Secret
preferences.description: Your OAuth application Client Secret. Get it from https://profile.intra.42.fr/oauth/applications

preferences.name: debugMode
preferences.label: Enable API error messages
preferences.title: Debug Mode
preferences.description: Enable debug mode to see detailed error messages

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
